thread.title: Stay consistent or forget about EPL: Arsenal defender Per Mertesacker
thread.title_full: Stay consistent or forget about EPL: Arsenal defender Per Mertesacker - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Stay consistent or forget about EPL: Arsenal defender Per Mertesacker
text:
*London:* Per Mertesacker admits Arsenal must build on their crucial Champions League victory over Bayern Munich and develop more consistency if they are to sustain their Premier League title challenge.
A victory over Everton at the Emirates Stadium today would move Arsenal to the top of the table, 24 hours before current ... Â»
